A. 2.5 × 10^-5

B. 1.5 × 10^-5

C. 3.0 × 10^-5

D. 4.0 × 10^-5

E. 5.0 × 10^-5

F. 1.0 × 10^-5

G. 1.2 × 10^-5

H. 2.0 × 10^-5

I. 6.0 × 10^-5

J. 3.5 × 10^-5

Answer with only a single letter. Answer:<|im_end|>
